snippet.title: Mammon's Gulch Map Reveal | Cinematic Trailer | Hunt: Showdown 1896
snippet.description:
With the Corruption dwindling in Louisiana and reports of an outbreak in the north, our Hunters travel to new lands. Each one has their own reason to chase after the foul creatures which now inhabit the oil fields and abandoned mines.

Once a verdant landscape of green forests and rocky crags, Mammon's Gulch now mimics its inhabitants, fetid and rotten, soon to be the latest stage of bloodshed and battle.

Hunt: Showdown 1896 will be launching to PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S on 15th August, 2024

Learn more: https://press.crytek.com/venture-deep-into-mammons-gulch-crytek-reveals-hunt-showdown-1896-entering-a-whole-new-era-of-hunt-in-the-rocky-mountains-of-colorado-launching-15th-august

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/HuntSteamYouTube

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntshowdown
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/crytek
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@huntshowdownofficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/huntshowdown

#HuntShowdown #Hunt #gaming
